#labels Phase-Deploy
How to move a database from one server to another using a backup

1. Stop tomcat
2. Clean out exist database by deleting current files
3. Restart tomcat
4. Restore
5. Log in with admin client and reindex all collections
6. (Change admin password to match tomcat and restart)
7. Visit the page repository/service/admin/changehost.xql - you should not need to change the values in the input boxes
